history.content:
They are technically still happening, and you can start here [http://studyabroad.berkeley.edu/] to look at programs and the overall process of doing study abroad. Week after next is the 'Study Abroad Week', which is kinda like a Career Fair but for Study Abroad and you can learn a lot more there. If you have any more specific questions, I'd recommend emailing a BSA advisor.

But as someone who was going to go abroad in the Fall and tried + failed to reapply for the Spring, I would say don't keep your hopes up about Summer/Fall 2021. Berkeley/UCEAP policies directly follow the government's travel recommendations/restrictions, and noone knows when that will change.

children.subject: As someone who, as an EU citizen, had to jump through ridiculous hoops just to get into my own country, I'd say not likely to happen the way this is going. On top of barely letting their own citizens in, most countries have just stopped processing Visas like a study abroad one in these times. If you want to, I'd focus on Fall 2021 because summer is not likely. Wouldn't be too optimistic that Fall will happen either though.

history.content: Not sure where the right place to ask this would be, but does anyone know if Study Abroad programs are happening in the Summer or Fall of 2021, and if so where I can find more information about them?
history.subject: Study Abroad Summer/Fall 2021
